str.name: Strength
str.description: Strength is a measure of your raw physical power. It affects how much you can carry, and determines the effectiveness of all melee attacks.

per.name: Perception
per.description: Perception is your environmental awareness and "sixth sense", and affects weapon accuracy in V.A.T.S.

end.name: Endurance
end.description: Endurance is the measure of overall physical fitness, it affects your total health and the action point drain from sprinting.

cha.name: Charisma
cha.description: Charisma is your ability to charm and convince others. It affects your success to persuade others in dialogue and prices when you barter.

int.name: Intelligence
int.description: Intelligence is the measure of your overall mental acuity, and affects the number of experience points earned.

agi.name: Agility
agi.description: Agility is a measure of your overall finesse and reflexes, it affects the number of Action Points in V.A.T.S. and your ability to sneak.

luc.name: Luck
luc.description: Luck is a measure of your general good fortune, and affects the recharge rates of critical hits.

ironFist.name: Iron Fist
ironFist.mainDescription: Increase unarmed punching damage by 20% per rank; higher ranks add disarm, cripple and stun effects.
ironFist.rank1description: Channel your chi to unleash devastating fury! Punching attacks do 20% more damage to your opponent.
ironFist.rank2description: Punching attacks now do 40% more damage and can disarm your opponent.
ironFist.rank3description: Punching attacks now do 60% more damage. Unarmed Power Attacks have a chance to cripple one of your opponent's limbs.
ironFist.rank4description: Punching attacks now do 80% more damage. Unarmed Power Attacks have an increased chance to cripple one of your opponent's limbs.
ironFist.rank5description: Punching attacks now do double damage. Criticals in V.A.T.S. will paralyze your opponent.

bigLeagues.name: Big Leagues
bigLeagues.mainDescription: Increase melee weapon damage by 20% per rank; higher ranks add disarm, area hits and crippling effects.
bigLeagues.rank1description: Swing for the fences! Do 20% more melee weapon damage.
bigLeagues.rank2description: You now do 40% more melee weapon damage and gain a chance to disarm your opponent.
bigLeagues.rank3description: You now do 60% more melee weapon damage and gain an increased chance to disarm your opponent.
bigLeagues.rank4description: You now do 80% more melee weapon damage and hit all targets in front of you.
bigLeagues.rank5description: You now do double damage with a melee weapon, and gain a chance to cripple your opponent, or grand slam their head clean off!

armorer.name: Armorer
armorer.mainDescription: Unlock one additional armor mod tier per rank, granting access to higher-rank armor modifications.
armorer.rank1description: Protect yourself from the dangers of the Wasteland with access to base level and Rank 1 armor mods.
armorer.rank2description: You gain access to Rank 2 armor mods.
armorer.rank3description: You gain access to Rank 3 armor mods.
armorer.rank4description: You gain access to Rank 4 armor mods.

blacksmith.name: Blacksmith
blacksmith.mainDescription: Unlock one additional melee weapon mod tier per rank, enabling progressively better upgrades.
blacksmith.rank1description: Fire up the forge and gain access to base level and Rank 1 melee weapon mods.
blacksmith.rank2description: You gain access to Rank 2 melee weapon mods.
blacksmith.rank3description: You gain access to Rank 3 melee weapon mods.

heavyGunner.name: Heavy Gunner
heavyGunner.mainDescription: Increase heavy gun damage by 20% per rank; higher ranks also improve hip-fire accuracy and add stagger chance.
heavyGunner.rank1description: Thanks to practice and conditioning, heavy guns do 20% more damage.
heavyGunner.rank2description: Heavy guns now do 40% more damage, and have improved hip fire accuracy.
heavyGunner.rank3description: Heavy guns now do 60% more damage. Hip fire accuracy is increased even more.
heavyGunner.rank4description: Heavy guns now do 80% more damage and have a chance to stagger your opponent.
heavyGunner.rank5description: Heavy guns now do double damage.

strongBack.name: Strong Back
strongBack.mainDescription: Increase carry capacity and reduce overencumbered penalties; higher ranks allow running while overencumbered and reduce AP running cost.
strongBack.rank1description: What are you, part pack mule? Gain +25 to carry weight
strongBack.rank2description: You now have +50 to carry weight.
strongBack.rank3description: When overencumbered, you can use Action Points to run.
strongBack.rank4description:
(Normal mode) When overencumbered, you can fast travel.
(Survival mode) When overencumbered, you will not become injured.
strongBack.rank5description: When overencumbered, running costs 50% less action points.

steadyAim.name: Steady Aim
steadyAim.mainDescription: Improve hip-fire accuracy (and later hip-fire damage) when firing guns.
steadyAim.rank1description: Stay on target! Hip-fire accuracy is improved when firing any gun.
steadyAim.rank2description: Hip-fire accuracy is improved even more when firing any gun.
steadyAim.rank3description: Hip-fire damage is improved when firing any gun.

basher.name: Basher
basher.mainDescription: Increase gun bash damage by 25% per rank; higher ranks also add chances to cripple or cause Critical Hits.
basher.rank1description: Get up close and personal! Gun bashing does 25% more damage.
basher.rank2description: Gun bashing now does 50% more damage and possibly cripples your opponent.
basher.rank3description: Gun bashing now does 75% more damage and has an increased chance to cripple your opponent.
basher.rank4description: Gun bashing does double damage and has an increased chance to cripple your opponent. It may also inflict a Critical Hit.

rooted.name: Rooted
rooted.mainDescription: Gain Damage Resistance and melee/unarmed damage bonuses while standing still; higher ranks strengthen these bonuses and add auto-disarm effects.
rooted.rank1description: You're part tree! While standing still, you gain +25 Damage Resistance and your melee and unarmed attacks deal 25% more damage.
rooted.rank2description: While standing still, you now gain +50 Damage Resistance and your melee and unarmed attacks deal 50% more damage.
rooted.rank3description: While standing still, you may automatically disarm enemies that use melee weapons against you.

painTrain.name: Pain Train
painTrain.mainDescription: While wearing Power Armor, sprinting into enemies deals damage and staggers them; stronger at higher ranks.
painTrain.rank1description: Choo Choo! All aboard! While wearing Power Armor, sprinting into enemies hurts and staggers them. (Robots and oversized enemies are immune to the stagger.)
painTrain.rank2description: Sprinting into enemies while wearing Power Armor now causes severe damage and a more powerful stagger. (Robots and oversized enemies are immune to the stagger.)
painTrain.rank3description: Sprinting into enemies while wearing Power Armor now causes massive damage and knocks them down. Impact landing near enemies inflicts even more damage.

pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.mainDescription: Increase pickpocket success chance by 25% per rank and unlock stealing equipped items at higher ranks.
pickpocket.rank1description: Your quick hands and sticky fingers make picking pockets 25% easier.
pickpocket.rank2description: Picking pockets is now 50% easier. You can place a live grenade in a person's inventory.
pickpocket.rank3description: Picking pockets is now 75% easier, and you can steal equipped weapons.
pickpocket.rank4description: Picking pockets is now twice as easy, and you can steal equipped items.

rifleman.name: Rifleman
rifleman.mainDescription: Increase non-automatic rifle damage by 20% per rank; higher ranks ignore some armor and add a chance to cripple limbs.
rifleman.rank1description: Keep your distance long and your kill-count high. Attacks with non-automatic rifles do 20% more damage.
rifleman.rank2description: Attacks with non-automatic rifles do 40% more damage and ignore 15% of a target's armor.
rifleman.rank3description: Attacks with non-automatic rifles do 60% more damage and ignore 20% of a target's armor.
rifleman.rank4description: Attacks with non-automatic rifles do 80% more damage and ignore 25% of a target's armor. They also have a slight chance of crippling a limb.
rifleman.rank5description: Attacks with non-automatic rifles do double damage and ignore 30% of a target's armor. They also have a slightly higher chance of crippling a limb.

awareness.name: Awareness
awareness.mainDescription: Reveal enemy damage resistances in V.A.T.S.; higher rank also grants a small V.A.T.S. hit and damage bonus.
awareness.rank1description: To defeat your enemies, know their weaknesses! You can view a target's specific damage resistances in V.A.T.S.
awareness.rank2description: Knowing their weaknesses lets you attack more efficiently. 5% increase to hit chance and damage dealt to VATS targets.

locksmith.name: Locksmith
locksmith.mainDescription: Allows picking higher-rank locks; max rank prevents bobby pins from breaking.
locksmith.rank1description: Your nimble fingers allow you to pick Advanced locks.
locksmith.rank4description: Your bobby pins never break during lockpicking.

demolitionExpert.name: Demolition Expert
demolitionExpert.mainDescription: Increase explosive damage by 25% per rank and unlock explosive crafting; higher ranks further boost damage and effects.
demolitionExpert.rank1description: The bigger the boom, the better! Your explosives do 25% more damage, and you can craft explosives at any chemistry station.
demolitionExpert.rank2description: Your explosives do 50% more damage, and grenades gain a throwing arc.
demolitionExpert.rank3description: Your explosives do 75% more damage and affect a larger area.
demolitionExpert.rank4description: Your explosives now do double damage. Mines and grenades shot in V.A.T.S explode for double damage, too.

nightPerson.name: Night Person
nightPerson.mainDescription: Gain nighttime bonuses to Perception and Intelligence; higher ranks add extra benefits.
nightPerson.rank1description: You are a creature of the night! Gain +2 to Intelligence and Perception between the hours of 6:00 p.m. and 6:00 a.m.
nightPerson.rank2description: You now have +3 to Intelligence and Perception between the hours of 6:00 p.m. and 6:00 a.m., and night vision when sneaking.
nightPerson.rank3description: You have 30 extra health between the hours of 6:00 PM and 6:00 AM.

refractor.name: Refractor
refractor.mainDescription: Increase Energy Resistance by 10 per rank.
refractor.rank1description: You must be part mirror! Instantly gain +10 Energy Resistance.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.mainDescription: Improve scoped aiming and grant scoped-rifle bonuses; accuracy and headshot benefits increase per rank.
sniper.rank1description: It's all about focus. You have improved control and can hold your breath longer when aiming with scopes.
sniper.rank2description: "Non-automatic, scoped rifles have a chance of knocking down your target." Chance is 15%
sniper.rank3description: Non-automatic, scoped rifles gain +25% accuracy to head shot in V.A.T.S.

penetrator.name: Penetrator
penetrator.mainDescription: Allow targeting body parts behind cover in V.A.T.S.; accuracy penalty removed at top rank.
penetrator.rank1description: There's no place to hide! In V.A.T.S you can target an enemy's body parts that are blocked by cover, with a decrease in accuracy.
penetrator.rank2description: In V.A.T.S when you target an enemy's body parts that are blocked by cover, there is no decrease in accuracy.

concentratedFire.name: Concentrated Fire
concentratedFire.mainDescription: In V.A.T.S., repeated attacks on the same body part increase accuracy and, at top rank, also increase damage.
concentratedFire.rank1description: Stay Focused! In V.A.T.S every attack on the same body part gains +10% accuracy.
concentratedFire.rank2description: In V.A.T.S every attack on the same body part gains +15% accuracy.
concentratedFire.rank3description: In V.A.T.S every attack on the same body part gains +20% accuracy and does 20% more damage.

toughness.name: Toughness
toughness.mainDescription: Increase Damage Resistance by +10 per rank.
toughness.rank1description: If nothing else, you can take a beating! Instantly gain +10 damage resistance.

leadBelly.name: Lead Belly
leadBelly.mainDescription: Reduce radiation from eating/drinking: less radiation at rank1/2 and no radiation at rank3.
leadBelly.rank1description: Your digestive tract has adjusted to the weirdness of the Wasteland! Take less radiation from eating or drinking.
leadBelly.rank2description: You take even less radiation from eating or drinking.
leadBelly.rank3description: You take no radiation from eating or drinking.

lifeGiver.name: Life Giver
lifeGiver.mainDescription: Adds +20 max HP per rank; top rank grants slow passive HP regen.
lifeGiver.rank1description: You embody wellness! Instantly gain +20 maximum Health.
lifeGiver.rank2description: You instantly gain another +20 maximum Health.
lifeGiver.rank3description: You instantly gain another +20 maximum Health, and slowly regenerate lost Health.

chemResistant.name: Chem Resistant
chemResistant.mainDescription: Reduce chance of chem addiction (50% at low rank) and gain full immunity at max rank.
chemResistant.rank1description: All the rush without the hassle! You're 50% less likely to get addicted when consuming Chems
chemResistant.rank2description: You gain complete immunity to chem addiction.

aquaboy.name: Aquaboy/Aquagirl
aquaboy.mainDescription: No radiation from swimming and breathe underwater at rank1; become undetectable while submerged at rank2.
aquaboy.rank1description: Water is your ally. You no longer take radiation damage from swimming, and can breathe underwater.
aquaboy.rank2description: You become totally undetectable while submerged.

radResistant.name: Rad Resistant
radResistant.mainDescription: Increase Radiation Resistance by +10 per rank.
radResistant.rank1description: Exposure to the Wasteland has made you more resilient, instantly granting +10 Radiation Resistance.

adamantiumSkeleton.name: Adamantium Skeleton
adamantiumSkeleton.mainDescription: Reduce limb damage by 30% per rank; eliminate limb damage at max rank.
adamantiumSkeleton.rank1description: Your skeleton has been infused with indestructible metal, reducing limb damage by 30%.
adamantiumSkeleton.rank2description: Your limb damage is now reduced by 60%.
adamantiumSkeleton.rank3description: Your limb damage is completely eliminated.

cannibal.name: Cannibal
cannibal.mainDescription: Eating corpses restores HP; higher ranks expand which corpse types heal (ghouls, super mutants) and increase healed amount.
cannibal.rank1description: Feast on mortal flesh to heal your wounds! Eating human corpses restores Health.
cannibal.rank2description: Eating Ghoul or Super Mutant corpses restores Health.
cannibal.rank3description: Eating human, Ghoul or Super Mutant corpses now restores a significant amount of Health.

ghoulish.name: Ghoulish
ghoulish.mainDescription: Radiation regenerates lost Health, increasing at higher ranks; top ranks may also pacify nearby feral ghouls.
ghoulish.rank1description: Sure, you're still human - on the outside! Radiation now regenerates your lost Health.
ghoulish.rank2description: Radiation now regenerates even more of your lost Health.
ghoulish.rank3description: Radiation now regenerates even more of your lost Health, and some Feral Ghouls will randomly become friendly.
ghoulish.rank4description: Rad damage will now begin to slowly heal, restoring health in the process.

solarPowered.name: Solar Powered
solarPowered.mainDescription: Gain Strength and Endurance bonuses in sunlight and additional sunlight-based healing effects at higher ranks.
solarPowered.rank1description: Catch some rays! Gain +2 to Strength and Endurance between the hours of 6:00 a.m. and 6:00 p.m.
solarPowered.rank2description: Sunlight slowly heals your radiation damage.
solarPowered.rank3description: Sunlight slowly regenerates your lost Health.

capCollector.name: Cap Collector
capCollector.mainDescription: Improve vendor buy/sell prices; top rank allows investing caps to raise a store's buying capacity.
capCollector.rank1description: You've mastered the art of the deal! Buying and selling prices at vendors are better.
capCollector.rank2description: Buying and selling prices of vendors are now much better.
capCollector.rank3description: You can now invest a total of 500 caps to raise a store's buying capacity.

ladyKiller.name: Lady Killer
ladyKiller.mainDescription: Grants special dialogue and +5% damage vs. female targets per rank.
ladyKiller.rank1description: You're charming... and dangerous. Women suffer +5% damage in combat, and are easier to persuade in dialogue.
ladyKiller.rank2description: Women now suffer +10% damage in combat, and are even easier to persuade in dialogue. They are also easier to pacify with the Intimidation perk.
ladyKiller.rank3description: Women now suffer +15% damage in combat, and are much easier to persuade in dialogue. They are now even easier to pacify with the Intimidation perk.

blackWidow.name: Black Widow
blackWidow.mainDescription: Grants special dialogue and +5% damage vs. male targets per rank.
blackWidow.rank1description: You're charming... and dangerous. Men suffer +5% damage in combat, and are easier to persuade in dialogue.
blackWidow.rank2description: Men now suffer +10% damage in combat, and are even easier to persuade in dialogue. They are also easier to pacify with the Intimidation perk.
blackWidow.rank3description: Men now suffer +15% damage in combat, and are much easier to persuade in dialogue. They are now even easier to pacify with the Intimidation perk.

loneWanderer.name: Lone Wanderer
loneWanderer.mainDescription: When adventuring without a companion, gain defensive and carry bonuses and additional combat/utility benefits at higher ranks.
loneWanderer.rank1description: Who needs friends, anyway? When adventuring without a companion, you take 15% less damage and carry weight increases by 50.
loneWanderer.rank2description: When adventuring without a companion, you take 30% less damage and carry weight increases by 100
loneWanderer.rank3description: When adventuring without a companion, you do 25% more damage.
loneWanderer.rank4description: When adventuring without a companion, you have 25 more action points.

attackDog.name: Attack Dog
attackDog.mainDescription: Your dog assists in combat and utility; higher ranks increase companion effectiveness and grant defensive bonuses to you.
attackDog.rank1description: Your faithful canine companion can hold an enemy, giving you a greater chance to hit them in V.A.T.S.
attackDog.rank2description: When your dog holds an enemy, there's a chance he'll cripple the limb he's biting.
attackDog.rank3description: When your dog holds an enemy, there's a chance he'll cause them to bleed.
attackDog.rank4description: When adventuring with your dog, you take 10% less damage.

animalFriend.name: Animal Friend
animalFriend.mainDescription: Allows pacifying animals and later commanding them; higher ranks expand control options.
animalFriend.rank1description: Commune with beasts! With your gun, aim at any animal below your level and gain a chance to pacify it.
animalFriend.rank2description: When you successfully pacify an animal, you can incite it to attack
animalFriend.rank3description: When you successfully pacify an animal, you can give it specific commands

localLeader.name: Local Leader
localLeader.mainDescription: Enable supply lines between settlements and, at higher rank, build stores and workstations at workshops.
localLeader.rank1description: As the ruler everyone turns to, you are able to establish supply lines between your workshop settlements.
localLeader.rank2description: You can build stores and workstations at workshop settlements.

partyBoy.name: Party Boy
partyBoy.mainDescription: Prevents alcohol addiction; doubles alcohol effects at rank 2; +3 Luck while drunk at rank 3.
partyBoy.rank1description: Nobody has a good time like you! There's no chance you'll get addicted to alcohol.
partyBoy.rank2description: The effects of alcohol are doubled.
partyBoy.rank3description: Your Luck is increased by 3 while you're under the influence of alcohol.

partyGirl.name: Party Girl
partyGirl.mainDescription: Prevents alcohol addiction; doubles alcohol effects at rank 2; +3 Luck while drunk at rank 3.
partyGirl.rank1description: Nobody has a good time like you! There's no chance you'll get addicted to alcohol.
partyGirl.rank2description: The effects of alcohol are doubled.
partyGirl.rank3description: Your Luck is increased by 3 while you're under the influence of alcohol.

inspirational.name: Inspirational
inspirational.mainDescription: Improve companion combat effectiveness and utility; higher ranks boost companion survivability and carrying capacity.
inspirational.rank1description: Because you lead by example, your companion does more damage in combat, and cannot hurt you.
inspirational.rank2description: Your companion resists more damage in combat, and can't be harmed by your attacks.
inspirational.rank3description: Your companion can carry more items.

wastelandWhisperer.name: Wasteland Whisperer
wastelandWhisperer.mainDescription: Allows pacifying and commanding Wasteland creatures; higher ranks expand command options.
wastelandWhisperer.rank1description: Master the post-apocalypse! With your gun, aim at any Wasteland creature below your level and gain a chance to pacify it.
wastelandWhisperer.rank2description: When you successfully pacify a creature, you can incite it to attack.
wastelandWhisperer.rank3description: When you successfully pacify a creature, you can give it specific commands.

intimidation.name: Intimidation
intimidation.mainDescription: Allows pacifying and commanding human opponents with your gun; higher ranks strengthen control effects.
intimidation.rank1description: Time to show everyone who's boss! With your gun, aim at any human opponent below your level and gain a chance to pacify them.
intimidation.rank2description: When you successfully pacify someone, you can incite them to attack.
intimidation.rank3description: When you successfully pacify someone, you can give them specific commands.

vans.name: V.A.N.S.
vans.mainDescription: Show the path to the closest quest target in V.A.T.S. (rank1); rank2 grants +2 Perception.
vans.rank1description: Let Vault-Tec guide you! The path to your closest quest target is displayed in V.A.T.S.

medic.name: Medic
medic.mainDescription: Improve Stimpak and RadAway effectiveness by 20% per rank, up to full restore at max rank.
medic.rank1description: Is there a doctor in the house? Stimpaks restore 40% of lost Health, and RadAway removes 40% of radiation.
medic.rank2description: Stimpaks restore 60% of lost Health, and RadAway removes 60% of radiation
medic.rank3description: Stimpaks restore 80% of lost Health, and RadAway removes 80% of radiation
medic.rank4description: Stimpaks and RadAway restore all lost health and radiation, and work much more quickly.

gunNut.name: Gun Nut
gunNut.mainDescription: Unlock one additional gun mod tier per rank, granting access to progressively better weapon modifications.
gunNut.rank1description: Shoot first, kill first, with access to base level and Rank 1 gun mods.
gunNut.rank2description: You gain access to Rank 2 gun mods
gunNut.rank3description: You gain access to Rank 3 gun mods
gunNut.rank4description: You gain access to Rank 4 gun mods

hacker.name: Hacker
hacker.mainDescription: Allow hacking of higher-level terminals and, at max rank, avoid being locked out when hacking fails.
hacker.rank1description: Knowledge of cutting-edge computer encryption allows you to hack Advanced terminals
hacker.rank4description: When hacking, you never get locked out of a terminal when things go wrong.

scrapper.name: Scrapper
scrapper.mainDescription: Improve salvage yields when scrapping weapons and armor, unlocking uncommon and rare components at higher ranks.
scrapper.rank1description: Waste not, want not! You can salvage uncommon components like screws, aluminum, and copper when scrapping weapons and armor.
scrapper.rank2description: You can salvage rare components like circuitry, nuclear material, and fiber optics when scrapping weapons and armor. Items with favorited components are highlighted.
scrapper.rank3description: You get more from salvaging. Appears to only apply to uncommon components, i.e., those affected by the first level of the perk.

science.name: Science!
science.mainDescription: Unlock one additional high-tech mod tier per rank for advanced weapon and armor modifications.
science.rank1description: Take full advantage of advanced technology with access to base level and Rank 1 high-tech mods.
science.rank2description: You gain access to Rank 2 high-tech mods.
science.rank3description: You gain access to Rank 3 high-tech mods.
science.rank4description: You gain access to Rank 4 high-tech mods.

chemist.name: Chemist
chemist.mainDescription: Increase chem duration by 50% per rank, up to +200% at max rank.
chemist.rank1description: Any chems you take last 50% longer. Far out.
chemist.rank2description: Any chems you take now last twice as long.
chemist.rank3description: Any chems you take now last an additional 150% longer.
chemist.rank4description: Any chems you take now last an additional 200% longer.

roboticsExpert.name: Robotics Expert
roboticsExpert.mainDescription: Grant abilities to hack and command robots; higher ranks expand control options.
roboticsExpert.rank1description: Machines will always serve humans, if you have anything to say about it. Hack a robot, and gain a chance to power it on or off, or initiate a self-destruct.
roboticsExpert.rank2description: When you successfully hack a robot, you can incite it to attack.
roboticsExpert.rank3description: When you successfully hack a robot, you can give it specific commands.

nuclearPhysicist.name: Nuclear Physicist
nuclearPhysicist.mainDescription: Boost radiation weapon damage and extend Fusion Core duration; top rank enables ejecting Fusion Cores from Power Armor as a powerful attack.
nuclearPhysicist.rank1description: You've learned to split the atom... and command it. Radiation weapons do 50% more damage and Fusion Cores last an extra 25% longer.
nuclearPhysicist.rank2description: Radiation weapons now do double damage and Fusion Cores last an extra 50% longer.
nuclearPhysicist.rank3description: Fusion Cores can be ejected from Power Armor like devastating grenades and Fusion Cores last twice as long.

nerdRage.name: Nerd Rage!
nerdRage.mainDescription: When Health is low, gain increased damage and Damage Resistance; higher ranks further increase these bonuses and provide healing on kills.
nerdRage.rank1description: Genius. Is. ANGRY! When your Health drops below 20%, time slows and you gain +20 Damage resistance and do 20% more damage while the effect lasts.
nerdRage.rank2description: You now gain 30 more Damage Resistance and do 30% more damage while Nerd Rage is in effect.
nerdRage.rank3description: You now gain 40 more Damage Resistance and do 40% more damage while Nerd Rage is in effect. Kills you make while enraged restore some lost Health.

gunslinger.name: Gunslinger
gunslinger.mainDescription: Increase non-automatic pistol damage by 20% per rank; higher ranks also boost range and add disarm/cripple chances.
gunslinger.rank1description: Channel the spirit of the old west! Non-automatic pistols do 20% more damage.
gunslinger.rank2description: Non-automatic pistols now do 40% more damage and have increased range.
gunslinger.rank3description: Non-automatic pistols now do 60% more damage and range is increased even further.
gunslinger.rank4description: Non-automatic pistols now do 80% more damage and their attacks can disarm opponents.
gunslinger.rank5description: Non-automatic pistols now do double damage. Their attacks have a much better chance to disarm opponents, and may even cripple a limb.

commando.name: Commando
commando.mainDescription: Increase automatic weapon damage by 20% per rank; higher ranks also improve hip-fire accuracy and stagger chance.
commando.rank1description: Rigorous combat training means automatic weapons do 20% more damage
commando.rank2description: Attacks with automatic weapons do 40% more damage, with improved hip fire accuracy.
commando.rank3description: Attacks with automatic weapons do 60% more damage. Hip fire accuracy is improved even more.
commando.rank4description: Attacks with automatic weapons do 80% more damage and gain a chance to stagger opponents.
commando.rank5description: Your automatic weapons now do double damage and have a greater chance to stagger opponents.

sneak.name: Sneak
sneak.mainDescription: Reduce detection while sneaking by 10% per rank (20% at rank1); top rank makes distant enemies lose you.
sneak.rank1description: Become whisper, become shadow. You are 20% harder to detect while sneaking.
sneak.rank2description: You are now 30% harder to detect while sneaking, and no longer trigger floor-based traps.
sneak.rank3description: You are now 40% harder to detect while sneaking, and no longer trigger enemy mines.
sneak.rank4description: You are now 50% harder to detect while sneaking, and running no longer adversely affects stealth.
sneak.rank5description: Engaging stealth causes distant enemies to lose you.

misterSandman.name: Mister Sandman
misterSandman.mainDescription: Instantly kill sleeping NPCs and increase silenced sneak attack damage: +15% (rank1), +30% (rank2), +50% (rank3).
misterSandman.rank1description: As an agent of death, you can instantly kill a sleeping person. Your silenced weapons do an additional 15% sneak attack damage.
misterSandman.rank2description: Your silenced weapons do an additional 30% sneak attack damage.
misterSandman.rank3description: Your silenced weapons now do 50% more sneak attack damage.

actionBoy.name: Action Boy
actionBoy.mainDescription: Increases Action Point regeneration by 25% per rank.
actionBoy.rank1description: There's no time to waste! Action Points regenerate 25% faster.
actionBoy.rank2description: Your Action Points now regenerate 50% faster.
actionBoy.rank3description: Your Action Points now regenerate 75% faster.

actionGirl.name: Action Girl
actionGirl.mainDescription: Increases Action Point regeneration by 25% per rank.
actionGirl.rank1description: There's no time to waste! Action Points regenerate 25% faster.
actionGirl.rank2description: Your Action Points now regenerate 50% faster.
actionGirl.rank3description: Your Action Points now regenerate 75% faster.

movingTarget.name: Moving Target
movingTarget.mainDescription: Gain Damage Resistance and Energy Resistance while sprinting; higher ranks increase bonuses and reduce AP cost.
movingTarget.rank1description: They can't hurt what they can't hit! Get 25+ Damage Resistance and 25+ Energy Resistance when you're sprinting.
movingTarget.rank2description: You now get +50 Damage Resistance and +50 Energy Resistance when you're sprinting.

ninja.name: Ninja
ninja.mainDescription: Greatly increases sneak attack damage multipliers for ranged and melee attacks; higher ranks amplify these multipliers.
ninja.rank1description: Trained as a shadow warrior, your ranged sneak attack do 2.5x normal damage and your melee attacks do 4x normal damage.
ninja.rank2description: Your ranged sneak attacks do 3x normal damage and your melee sneak attacks do 5x normal damage.
ninja.rank3description: Your ranged sneak attacks do 3.5x normal damage and your melee sneak attacks do 10x normal damage.

quickHands.name: Quick Hands
quickHands.mainDescription: Speeds up reloads and reduces AP cost for reloading in V.A.T.S.; top rank gives extra Action Points.
quickHands.rank1description: In combat, there's no time to hesitate. You can reload all guns faster.
quickHands.rank2description: Reloading guns costs no Action Points in V.A.T.S.
quickHands.rank3description: Quick and efficient. You gain 10 additional Action Points.

blitz.name: Blitz
blitz.mainDescription: Extends V.A.T.S. melee distance and increases damage with greater distance at higher rank.
blitz.rank1description: Find the gap and make the tackle! V.A.T.S. melee distance is increased significantly.
blitz.rank2description: V.A.T.S. melee distance is increased even more, and the farther the Blitz distance, the greater the damage.

gunFu.name: Gun Fu
gunFu.mainDescription: Increase V.A.T.S. damage to additional targets by 25% per rank; top rank grants an extra Critical against the fourth target.
gunFu.rank1description: You've learned to apply ancient martial arts to gunplay! Do 25% more damage to your second V.A.T.S. target and beyond.
gunFu.rank2description: In V.A.T.S. you do 50% more damage to your third target and beyond.
gunFu.rank3description: In V.A.T.S. you instantly do a Critical Hit against your fourth target and beyond.

fortuneFinder.name: Fortune Finder
fortuneFinder.mainDescription: Increase caps found in containers; higher ranks increase yield and unlock rare effects.
fortuneFinder.rank1description: You've learned to discover the Wasteland's hidden wealth, and discover more bottle caps in containers.
fortuneFinder.rank2description: You find even more bottle caps in containers.
fortuneFinder.rank3description: You find even more bottle caps in containers.
fortuneFinder.rank4description: You find even more bottle caps in containers, and there is a chance of enemies exploding into a shower of caps when you kill them.

scrounger.name: Scrounger
scrounger.mainDescription: Increase ammo found in containers; top rank sometimes grants ammo when firing the last round.
scrounger.rank1description: You know just how to scavenge to keep the fight going, and find more ammunition in containers.
scrounger.rank2description: You find even more ammunition in containers.
scrounger.rank3description: You find even more ammunition in containers.
scrounger.rank4description: There is a chance to gain ammo when firing the last round in your magazine.

bloodyMess.name: Bloody Mess
bloodyMess.mainDescription: Increase damage by 5% per rank; top rank adds explosive gore effects.
bloodyMess.rank1description: +5% bonus damage means enemies will sometimes explode into a gory red paste. Watch out for flying eyeballs!
bloodyMess.rank2description: You now inflict +10% damage in combat.
bloodyMess.rank3description: You now inflict +15% damage in combat.
bloodyMess.rank4description: When an enemy explodes, nearby enemies may suffer the same fate.

mysteriousStranger.name: Mysterious Stranger
mysteriousStranger.mainDescription: The Mysterious Stranger may appear in V.A.T.S. to assist you; higher ranks increase his appearance chance and rewards.
mysteriousStranger.rank1description: Who is he? Why does he help? Who cares! The Mysterious Stranger will appear occasionally in V.A.T.S. to lend a hand, with deadly efficiency...
mysteriousStranger.rank2description: The Mysterious Stranger appears more often in V.A.T.S.
mysteriousStranger.rank3description: The Mysterious Stranger appears more often in V.A.T.S. When he kills an opponent, there is a chance your Critical meter gets filled.
mysteriousStranger.rank4description: The Mysterious Stranger appears more often in V.A.T.S. When he kills an opponent, there is a high chance your Critical meter gets filled.

idiotSavant.name: Idiot Savant
idiotSavant.mainDescription: Sometimes grant large bonus XP from actions; chance scales inversely with Intelligence and improves with rank.
idiotSavant.rank1description: You're not stupid! Just... different. Randomly receive 3x XP from any action, and the lower your Intelligence, the greater the chance.
idiotSavant.rank2description: You now randomly receive 5x XP from any action. The lower your Intelligence, the greater the chance.
idiotSavant.rank3description: Randomly receiving bonus XP from any action may trigger 3x XP for all kills for a short period of time. The lower your Intelligence, the greater the chance.

betterCriticals.name: Better Criticals
betterCriticals.mainDescription: Increase extra Critical damage by 50% per rank (50% at rank1, up to 150% at max).
betterCriticals.rank1description: Advanced training for enhanced combat effectiveness! Criticals do 50% more extra damage.
betterCriticals.rank2description: Your criticals now do twice as much extra damage.
betterCriticals.rank3description: Your criticals now do 2.5x as much extra damage.

criticalBanker.name: Critical Banker
criticalBanker.mainDescription: Increase bankable Criticals by 1 per rank (up to 4).
criticalBanker.rank1description: You're a patient battlefield tactician, and can save a Critical Hit, to be used in V.A.T.S. when you need it most.
criticalBanker.rank2description: You can now save 2 Critical Hits, to be used in V.A.T.S. when you need them the most.
criticalBanker.rank3description: You can now save 3 Critical Hits, to be used in V.A.T.S. when you need them the most. Banking a Critical has a chance to save an additional Critical.
criticalBanker.rank4description: You can now save 4 Critical Hits, to be used in V.A.T.S. when you need them the most.

grimReapersSprint.name: Grim Reaper's Sprint
grimReapersSprint.mainDescription: Each V.A.T.S. kill has a chance to restore AP; +10% chance per rank (15% at rank1). Top rank also refills the Critical meter.
grimReapersSprint.rank1description: Death becomes you! Any kill in V.A.T.S. has a 15% chance to restore all Action Points.
grimReapersSprint.rank2description: Any kill in V.A.T.S. now has a 25% chance to restore all Action Points.
grimReapersSprint.rank3description: Any kill in V.A.T.S. has a 35% chance to restore all Action Points and refill your Critical meter.

fourLeafClover.name: Four Leaf Clover
fourLeafClover.mainDescription: Each hit in V.A.T.S. has a chance to fill your Critical meter, with higher ranks improving that chance.
fourLeafClover.rank1description: Feeling Lucky? You should! Each hit in V.A.T.S. has a chance of filling your Critical meter.
fourLeafClover.rank2description: Each hit in V.A.T.S. now has an even better chance of filling your Critical meter.
fourLeafClover.rank3description: Each hit in V.A.T.S. now has a very good chance of filling your Critical meter.
fourLeafClover.rank4description: Each hit in V.A.T.S. now has an excellent chance of filling your Critical meter.

ricochet.name: Ricochet
ricochet.mainDescription: Enemy ranged attacks can sometimes ricochet and kill them; higher ranks increase the chance and grant bonus effects.
ricochet.rank1description: What goes around comes around! Any enemy's ranged attacks will sometimes ricochet back and instantly kill them. The closer you are to death, the higher the chance.
ricochet.rank2description: There's an increased chance that an enemy's shot will ricochet back and kill them.
ricochet.rank3description: When an enemy's shot ricochets back and kills them, there is a chance your Critical meter gets filled.
